name: Cemetery Soultaker
description:
This is the  GameDev.tv Game Jam 2022 submission. 

https://github.com/Thracco/Cemetery-Soultaker

I used Unty3d,  Aseprite, BeepBox and Thaleah pixel art font. 

Souls are trying to enter Haven. If you collect less than the escaped souls, Lord Hades will be mad!
